title: fix your shit.
body: if im the only one running ezreal. if it round fucking 5. and i only have seen 2. IF IM THE ONLY ONE THAT WANTS IT. WHY ISNT IT SHOWING UP. I SOLD EVERYTHING AND REROLLED JUST TO SEE IF I COULD GET A 3rd AND HE DIDNT SHOW UP OFF OF 30 straight fucking rerolls. you cluttered the shit too much. its bs. im struggling to get A COMP THAT ISNT EVEN TAKEN.

replies.body: It's still random. Just because you are the only person playing a certain unit does increase odds of finding it, but at the same time, it doesn't mean you absolutely will find it.
Nothing is broken.. That's rng for u. Had that happen w/ many units, many costs, rolling during optimal times.. Yup, RNG.
Dont play a game that is basically entirely decided by luck if you dont like your games being decided by luck.

> [{quoted}](name=MagicFlyingLlama,realm=NA,application-id=RaE1aOE7,discussion-id=PVQJ3oZq,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2020-01-20T21:19:03.062+0000)
>
> Dont play a game that is basically entirely decided by luck if you dont like your games being decided by luck.

I agree - that is the whole truth what this pseudo game is - luck and luck or bad luck

No sophisticated skills just fast rerolling in right moments.
Zero tactics zero time to wantch and enjoy just hurry up reroll and reroll or they deleting your team.

Stupid shit for small childs.
